1.title: Introduction

episode of.title: How to become extremely smart (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Do you desire to increase your brain power? Do you feel you have not yet reached your potential? In this course you will find techniques on how to become extremely smart. All techniques are scientifically proven. I will explain the theory as well as provide practical techniques to implement it.
